amendment.description: Page 264, line 13, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $18,000,000)". Page 314, line 18, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $18,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 94 printed in House Report 115-297 to maintain FY17 funding level for National Science Foundation's Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering (CISE).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosen amendment (A104) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosen amendment (A104) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A104) offered by Ms. Rosen.
